P O O B L A S T I L O 

Spodaj podpisani Peter Božjastni, Emšo 09112001 pooblaščam gospoda Lupusa Maksimusa, da lahko v mojem imenu s kupcem ki ga sam najde, sklene prodajno pogodbo za stavbo št. 157, ležečo na parcelni številki 174/4, K.O. Šentjakob. 
Prodajna pogodba se lahko sklene le, če je način plačila gotovina oz. bančna transakcija. Za uspešno oprevljeno storitev gospod Maksimus pobere 5% nagrade vrednosti prodajne pogodbe. 

Gospod Maksiums dobi nagrado šele po uspešni transakciji finančnih sredstev na moj račun. To pooblastilo velja 12 mesec od datuma podpisa oziroma do mojega prisnega preklica. 

Datum: 8. September 2014 
Kraj: Šetrupert pri Sveti Gorici.

"Find the signed certificate or public key from the signer.
Written in the barcode inside the large big square is a BYTE64 representation of an UTF-8 encoded string, which represent the digital document.
Too many lines of text. \nThis doesn\'t mean there is too much text, it\'s just that the text with than many line breaks will not fit on the A4 paper.
This was not a Certificate (or a signature). Please try again
Please insert password for your key.
Wrong password or not a key.

Signature verified. 
 Document is authentic and trusted. 

 This means that all the data you have scanned is authentic. The Certificate that you have provided was checked against the root certificate (stored in this app) and the signature matched.


HOWEVER
 Sometimes the identities can be stolen. When this happens, the user reports this to the government, and the government revokes the certificate. If you are connected to the internet, this app checked for this information and the result is displayed below.
ALSO
 Dates of the signature are also sometimes forged or the same document is signed multiple times. Check also if the document was securely timestamped.

Signature verified. 
 Document is authentic under the condition, that you trust the Certificate.
 What does this mean?:

 All the data that you scanned is valid. However, without you providing the Public Certificate, the app can not check whether the government is vouching for the identity. It can also not be checked if the certificate has been revoked.

Verification has failed.


This can mean 3 things:? 
 1: The document you provided is fraudulent - is fake.
 2: You scanned the QR codes incorrectly.
 3: The app might be malfunctioning.
Document was signed while certificate was valid.
